scripts.build:css: cleancss -o frontend/dist/base.min.css frontend/base.css && cleancss -o frontend/dist/components.min.css frontend/components.css && cleancss -o frontend/dist/layouts.min.css frontend/layouts.css && cleancss -o frontend/dist/dark-mode.min.css frontend/dark-mode.css
scripts.build:copy: if not exist frontend\dist mkdir frontend\dist && copy frontend\index.html frontend\dist\index.html && copy frontend\logo.svg frontend\dist\logo.svg
scripts.build: npm run build:copy && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.test:all: npm run test:jest && npm run test:cypress && npm run test:stylelint
scripts.dev:backend: set FLASK_APP=app:create_app&& set FLASK_RUN_PORT=8080&& flask run --host=127.0.0.1
